byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: We are now in the thick of the half-yearly railway gatherings, at which the shareholders congregate, in cager anticipation of the good things which directors have to announce for their benefit. Ever since the discolosure of the "dodges" by which the ex-railway potenlate, Hudson, contrived to make things "pleasant," these gatherings have been scrutinised for more closesly than used to be the case.

headline.main: ENGLAND; Railway Reports--The Queen's Visit to Scotland--Bloomerism abroad--Ascent of Mont Blanc--The Yacht American, c. &c.
